name: Elegant Weddings
description: Celebrate your love in style with our elegant wedding packages.
detailDescription: A beautiful celebration of love and commitment between two individuals. Weddings are marked with heartfelt vows, elegant decor, and joyful celebrations with family and friends.

name: Joyful Birthday Parties
description: Host a memorable birthday party for your loved ones.
detailDescription: Birthday parties are a time to celebrate the anniversary of a person's birth. They can range from intimate gatherings to large, themed parties, often featuring cake, presents, and games to make the birthday person feel special.

name: Romantic Anniversaries
description: Rekindle your love and celebrate years of togetherness.
detailDescription: Anniversaries commemorate significant milestones in relationships, such as wedding anniversaries or work anniversaries. These events are a time for reflection, appreciation, and often include romantic gestures to honor the time spent together.

name: Charming Engagement Parties
detailDescription: Engagement parties are celebrations held to announce and celebrate a couple's recent engagement. They are typically joyful events where family and friends come together to offer congratulations, share stories, and toast to the couple's future together.

name: Relaxing Retirement Parties
description: Celebrate a well-deserved retirement with a relaxing party.
detailDescription: Retirement parties honor an individual's transition from work life to retirement. These events celebrate the retiree's accomplishments, contributions, and often feature speeches, gifts, and well-wishes for a happy and relaxing retirement.

name: Adorable Baby Shower
description: Welcome the newest member of the family with an adorable baby shower.
detailDescription: A baby shower is a gathering of family and friends to celebrate the upcoming birth of a new baby. It's a time for the parents-to-be to receive gifts, parenting advice, and support from loved ones. Baby showers often feature games, cute decorations, and a focus on the anticipation of the new arrival.
